TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit LoggerException extends System.Exception

summary.span: 使记录器可以通过显式方式强制生成停止。

span.span: Allows a logger to force the build to stop in an explicit way.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此异常可由记录器，用于向宿主指示它已收到无效的参数，或不再继续出于某种原因的日志记录，并想要以可控方式停止。This exception can be used by a logger to indicate to a host that it has received invalid parameters, or can no longer continue logging for some reason, and wants to stop in a controlled way. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何编写基本记录器对应生成事件。The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events. [!code-csharp[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BasicLogger/CS/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]
